welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cascavel, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city known for its beautiful parks, rich cultural heritage, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cascavel has to offer.

restaurants.name: Panificadora Nosso Pão
restaurants.description: Panificadora Nosso Pão is a bakery located in Cascavel.
restaurants.address: Avenida Professor Vitoriano Antunes, 2253, Cascavel, CE, 62850-000

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cascavel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
